class_notes:
DABSN Semester 1, Session Two: March 8 - May 2, 2021


Online with synchronous sessions - Zoom.
course_description: This course provides beginning level knowledge and psychomotor skills necessary for assessing client's health status. Students will use the nursing process framework to elicit health histories and perform physical examinations in a systematic manner.
